entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
